title: deploy contract question or bug?
body:
#### System details

Version:  Geth/v1.6.6-stable-10a45cb5/windows-amd64
Go Version: go1.8.3
OS: Windows
uname -sr: Windows 10 
Distributor ID:	Windows


#### Expected behaviour
I want deploy solidity contract steady 

#### Actual behaviour
contract creation should success,but sometime success ,sometime not 

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I use the same contract byte code and the same sendtransaction execute code to submit it.
but yesterday 2 contract creation sucess

1.https://etherscan.io/tx/0x654ea592d856153467828f1d732d6428c8d33da55530f3eaded2d9497d3d9810
2.https://etherscan.io/tx/0xf7a6095e50583e08679e4e4ef6f584d96b4ae92a1b5b351d969ee26b945fb838


but today can not sucess, what happened about it? 
this is my test address:https://etherscan.io/address/0xc45d3dcb56165c457e0e8ff5dad56765e0dd6d74

#### this  is the request:

 ` {"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_sendTransaction","params":[{"from":"0xc45d3dcb56165c457e0e8ff5dad56765e0dd6d74","gas":"0x2dc6c0","gasPrice":"0x4a817c800","value":"0x0","data":""}]}`
####  this is what I see on geth console
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4479969/28399469-c33d350c-6d3f-11e7-9e58-9d1380863f34.png)

INFO [07-20|11:33:03] Submitted contract creation              fullhash=0x8beb84116614b2599d12b479f04abb6943a6225d22bc9d09743dd52517e4aa68 contract=0xa8d47b81dbb4c99b6c50f09d931d0b4ffcc4c1ef
 

anybody can help ?
